page.title: 11RECREATION DOWNDERRY/SEATON
page.content: The lack of flat land make formal outdoor recreation difficult.Soccer and cricket have had village teams playing on pitches well away from the settlement.Indoor sports are more popular and there are local teams for billiards,snooker,pool,badminton and darts.Some tennis,short tennis and table tennis is possible. Informal recreation often involves the sea where fishing,sailing and boating are popular.Pigeon & pheasant shoots occur Amateur drama is making a welcome return with a 1985 Xmas pantomime Ladies groups have organised leisure societies with craft and discussion groups.For men ,apart from the sports mentioned above the pub and the country club are the main alternatives from the garden and the television. Fortunately other facilities e.g. golf squash,chess are available nearby.
